Package com.smardec.license4j

Class Summary
License Class for storing license data.
LicenseManager The main class for managing licenses.
LicenseUtil Provides utility methods for generating key pair and for signing arbitrary user content.
 

Exception Summary
LicenseNotFoundException Thrown when the license file cannot be found ot cannot be read.
